DOC.brief_title: S0702 : Osteonecrosis Jaw Patients With Cancer Receiving Zoledronic Acid Bone Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To prospectively access cumulative incidence osteonecrosis jaw ( ONJ ) 3 year cancer patient bone metastasis receive zoledronic acid treatment . Secondary - To describe clinical presentation natural history ONJ . - To identify potential risk factor development ONJ . - To estimate cumulative incidence ONJ 3 year different tumor type ( i.e. , breast cancer , multiple myeloma , prostate cancer , lung cancer , cancer ) . - To good define patient-related outcome ONJ . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo dental assessment baseline every 3-6 month 3 year .
